extension.summary: A context menu item that works with Surveillance Room - a full featured IP Camera viewer for up to 6 IP Cameras.
extension.description: Choose from the settings how this will work, and play the camera in the view you want!
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not affiliated with Foscam. This add-on will modify some settings on the camera itself such as motion and sound detection settings.
